name: FreeFlowLayoutHKM
description: A layout engine for Android that decouples layouts from the View containers that manage scrolling and view recycling. FreeFlow makes it really easy to create custom layouts and beautiful transition animations as data and layouts change

name: RecyclerView-FlexibleDivider
description: Android library providing simple way to control divider items of RecyclerView

name: UltimateRecyclerView
description: A RecyclerView(advanced and flexible version of ListView in Android) with refreshing,loading more,animation and many other features.

name: Floating-Navigation-View
description: A simple Floating Action Button that shows an anchored Navigation View

name: ActionsContentView
description: ActionsContentView is an standalone library implements actions/content swiping view (AKA Side Navigation UI Pattern, AKA Facebook side menu).  The library doesn't use any specific code introduced in new Android SDK versions. This allows develop an application with an action/content swiping view for every version of Android from 2.2 and up.

name: ActivitySwitcher
description: ActivitySwitcher is based on the Activity view operation management library, you can achieve any jump between Activity, close any Activity and end applications and other functions.
